# __Use of multiple algorithms for optimization__

## Articles mentionning the risk

* [Ugail_social_2021](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Article/PBN__Article_534.md)

## Mitigations of this risk

* [Conduct thorough testing and validation of seating arrangements generated by different algorithms, and prioritize algorithms that emphasize social distancing](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Mitigation/PBN__Mitigation_14679.md)

## Name of the risk

Inefficient or suboptimal seating arrangements that do not adequately account for social distancing

## People affected by this risk

* [And public health experts](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_202.md)
* [Engineers](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_3657.md)
* [Mathematicians](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_5469.md)

## Stakeholders who can mitigate this risk

* [Development teams](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_413.md)
* [Research institutions](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_2885.md)

* [And data analysis](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_756.md)
